website_summaries.verdict: An included wand and fairy wings make this a magical doll to play with.
pros: Fairy wings, permanent “face paint” pattern, and a magic wand included
Great for kids age 5 and up
cons: Face paint may be too faint even when using included “wand” properly

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My autistic son is obsessed with baby dolls so we got this one for him so he now has all the fairy dolls. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Clements

customer_reviews.title: Great toy. Just buy generic preemie diapers.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this doll and another version (link below) as "twins" for Christmas. The other one, the "food" seems to get stuck no matter how careful she is. This one, she loves. We paid $11. It was totally worth it. It was a little smaller than expepected, but that wasn't a problem. Generic Preemie diapers do still fit, so you do NOT have to keep paying for Baby Alive diapers. The wings come off and the face paint is subtle. She has two other dolls that drink and wet-- a "Water Baby" and a "Baby Born". Both were way more expensive and both LEAK! This one doesn't leak at all!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Just buy cloth premie diapers instead of refills
customer_reviews.text: Diaper gets pretty fully with just one bottle so prepare to buy a bunch if you wanna let them use it like it’s ment to. Or get premier cloth diapers that and be reused over and over with out wear and tear or leaking problems if changes offered. Otherwise my daughter just loves it. Please like if this helped
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Really cute :)
customer_reviews.text: I love this doll so much!!!!! She is so cute!!!! GREAT QUALITY!!!!!! The diaper and the wings fit her perfectly! I am so happy with this doll!!!!! she deserves five stars because she's so soooooooooooo cute!!!!!!! :) I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS DOLL SO MUCH!!!!! The pen kinda does not work, but other than that I love her. :))
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Barely there face paint
customer_reviews.text: I can only give this 2 stars due to the pitiful face paint. Even with ice cold water, the color barely shows up and disappears immediately. It was the main thing my 5 year old was excited about. The rest of the doll is cute and fine and she is happy enough. I however, am frustrated with spending $ on items that dont work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: dsa lavallee

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these dolls to donate to the Children’s Hospital. Obviously, I can’t open them and check them out in full, but from what I can see they look great! I’m sure they will make some children happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: NO FREE RETURNS IF YOUR NOT SATISFIED!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE NO FREE RETURNS IF NOT SATISFIED. The children we had purchased them for already a pair of dolls that were a much better value so we returned these. The company charged us $9.00 to return the dolls. Will not do business with this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Adorable doll
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! My daughter just turned 3 and was so excited to be able to feed the baby. Well give her drinks. If she has it her way, we would have used all of the diapers we purchased for her already! Also, you can dry the diapers and reuse them. Not sure how long the tabs will stay sticky but has worked for us so far.
customer_reviews.author: jb05

customer_reviews.title: She was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to one of my granddaughters. She loved it. Got no complaints. She is a cute doll. The paint didn't work so well but she did not care.

product_meta.title: Baby Alive Face Paint Fairy (African American)
product_meta.description: Imagine fantastic fairy tales with the Baby Alive Face Paint Fairy doll. . . because girls and boys can simulate painting her face to look like a fairy! Fill her wand with ice cold water and drag it along her face like a paint brush to reveal a beautiful design -- it looks like face paint! Wipe her face with a warm hand and her face paint magically disappears to repeat the reveal play again and again. She drinks her bottle -- fill it up with water to feed her. After her bottle, she wets! Mommies and daddies can clean her up and change her diaper. Her enchanting dress comes with detachable fairy wings for dress-up and fantasy play, making mommy and daddy moments with the Face Paint Fairy doll magical, too! Baby Alive and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Reveal magical face paint with ice water
Wipe face with warm hands to make paint disappear
She drinks her bottle and wets her diaper
Play fairy dress-up with dress, wings, and wand
Includes 1 doll, 1 bottle, 1 diaper, 1 set of wings, 1 wand, and 1 removable outfit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars397 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
